sentences.english: The X-ray input window is made of aluminum or beryllium.
sentences.chinese: 其中，X射线入射窗的窗材是铝或铍。

sentences.english: But ignorance and misinformation about the health hazards of beryllium die hard.
sentences.chinese: 关于健康的破坏物铍的无知和误传是很顽固的。

sentences.english: Look at beryllium 2 plus, very tiny, charge plus two.
sentences.chinese: 例如铍二正离子，非常小，带2个单位正电。

sentences.english: BeCu for lifters if without water circuits.
sentences.chinese: 若没有运水回路，斜顶为铍铜。

sentences.english: Parts in contact with liquid in pipe are of brass and beryllium copper.
sentences.chinese: 在管道内与流体接触的部件是黄铜和铍铜合金。

sentences.english: Shiwan Khan needs a beryllium sphere to complete the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 史完可汗需要一个铍球来做炸弹。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a floating and collecting agent of bertrandite beryllium ores and application thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种羟硅铍石类铍矿浮选捕收剂及其应用。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a floating and collecting agent of bertrandite beryllium ores and application thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种羟硅铍石类铍矿浮选捕收剂及其应用。

sentences.english: Sell CEP Chengdu miniature to small progressive metal stampings.
sentences.chinese: 负责向冲压件企业销售西依铍成都公司产品。

sentences.english: The machine damage brings the tensile strength and the elongation value of beryllium to decrease.
sentences.chinese: 机加工损伤使铍的抗拉强度和延伸率均有较大降低。

sentences.english: A soft silvery metallic element a rare earth of the lanthanide series it occurs in gadolinite monazite xenotime.
sentences.chinese: 一种软银色稀土属金属元素见于硅铍钇独居石磷钇中。

sentences.english: Determination of micro beryllium in scheelite by polarography was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对白钨矿中微量铍的极谱测定进行了探讨。

sentences.english: The erosion of a divertor target of beryllium in a fusion reactor is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了偏滤器铍靶在聚变堆工况下的腐蚀问题。

sentences.english: Explain why barium forms peroxide but beryllium does not.
sentences.chinese: 解释为什么钡能形成过氧化物而铍则不能。
